requires.description: Defines the criteria for the dependent bundle. The key for each dependency is a way for the bundle to reference the dependency

bundle.description: A reference to a bundle in the format REGISTRY/NAME.

version.description: A set of criteria applied to the bundle version when selecting an acceptable version of the bundle.

ranges.description: An array of allowed version ranges. Versions are specified using semver, with or without a leading 'v'. An x in the place of the minor or patch place can be used to specify a wildcard. Ranges can be specified by separating the two versions with a dash, the dash must be surrounded by spaces in order to disambiguate from prerelease tags.

prereleases.description: Specifies if prerelease versions of the bundle are allowed.
